config.formats_in: The Witcher 2/3 3D models (*.w2mesh , *.w2ent);; The Witcher 1 3D models (*.mdb);; Red Engine 3D models (*.re);; Common 3D models formats (*.obj , *.fbx , *.3ds , *.lwo , *.lws , *.lxo , *.ac , *.cob , *.scn , *.xml , *.dae , *.mesh , *.my3D , *.blend , *.ase , *.mdc , *.smd , *.vta , *.m3 , *.3d , *.md5 , *.ifc , *.xgl , *.zgl , *.dxf , *.lmts , *.bsp , *.dmf , *.oct , *.irrmesh , *.csm , *.stl , *.bvh , *.csm , .*ply , *.x , *.b3d , *.ms3d , *.md3 , *.md2 , *.mdl , *.wal , *.smf , *.nff , *.q3d , *.q3s , *.off , *.raw , *.ter , *.mdl , *.hmp , *.ndo , *.assbin , *.assxml , *.gltf , *.glb)
